dt: {bc}a short vestment worn by a subdeacon over the alb during mass and by a bishop under the dalmatic at pontifical ceremonies

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}tonicle{/it}, Latin {it}tunicula{/it}, diminutive of {it}tunica{/it}
shortdef: a short vestment worn by a subdeacon over the alb during mass and by a bishop under the dalmatic at pontifical ceremonies
